trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SEQ_00<tab>Slowfix is concerned about the state of Idyllshire.

TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SEQ_01<tab>Slowfix is worried by the increasing number of organizational and administrative problems surfacing in Idyllshire. He needs the advice of a goblin with more of a head for these sorts of things─Dripwix. Unfortunately, Dripwix is nowhere to be seen. Slowfix asks you to track down Dripwix for him. Start by asking Midnight Dew. She should know where he is.

TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SEQ_02<tab>Midnight Dew tells you that Dripwix should be headed towards the Arkhitekton, in the Dravanian hinterlands. Hopefully you will be able to find him before the Illuminati do.
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SEQ_03<tab>You find Dripwix just as a group of Illuminati goblins descend upon him. Save him by slaying his assailants.
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SEQ_04<tab>Dripwix thanks you for saving him from the Illuminati's attack.
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_TODO_01<tab>Search for Dripwix near the Arkhitekton.
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SLOWFIX_000_000<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Idyllshire's problems grow more and more. Is very unorganized! Slowfix become very unrelaxed!
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SLOWFIX_000_001<tab>Slowfix needs advice. To fix these problems, need to talk with sharpbrain gobbie. Slowfix needs to talk with Dripwix. Dripwix can help!
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SLOWFIX_000_002<tab>But Slowfix cannot find him! Please help, uplander. Please find Dripwix. Perhaps Midnight Dew knows where he is.
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_SLOWFIX_000_012<tab>Please find Dripwix! Maybe Midnight Dew knows where he is!
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_010<tab>You're lookin' for Dripwix? Last I saw he was headin' towards the Arkhitekton. I hope he hasn't gone and got himself caught by the Illuminati...
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_023<tab>Still lookin' for Dripwix? Did you take a look near the Arkhitekton?
TEXT_HEAVNZ812_01942_DRIPWIX_000_030<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... You─you saved Dripwix? You are very widehearted uplander!
